product_name: Dr. BrandtBright This Way 24/7 Retinol Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGive BackDr. Brandt's Bright This Way 24/7 Retinol Eye Cream with Ruby Crystal Complex is a lightweight cream that brightens the eye contour, smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles, and moisturizes the eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor anyone looking for an effective eye moisturizer that instantly improves the look of the eye area, concerned with moisturization, lines and wrinkles and dark circlesFor all skin typesSmooths the look of lines and wrinklesHydrates and plumps the eye contour areaKey IngredientsRetinol: retinol (pure Vitamin A) is probably the most proven anti-aging ingredient available OTC; it makes skin less wrinkled, smoother, firmer and tighterGlycerin: a natural moisturizer that's also in our skin; not only a simple moisturizer but knows much more: keeps the skin lipids between our skin cells in a healthy (liquid crystal) state, protects against irritation, helps to restore barrierHyaluronic Acid: naturally in our skin and behaves there like a sponge and is an excellent surface hydrator, skin protectant and can act as an osmotic pump helping water-soluble actives to penetrate deeper into the skinFormulated WithoutSynthetic FragranceParabensSulfatesItem 2613727How To UseAM & PM. Use ring finger to apply 1 pump for both eyes along the orbital bone, from the outside corner of the eye inward.IngredientsAqua (Water) Glycerin Cyclopentasiloxane Propanediol Dimethiconol Coco-Caprylate/Caprate Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer Phenoxyethanol Mica Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil Sodium Benzoate Isohexadecane Polysorbate 60 Triethoxycaprylylsilane Maslinic Acid Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Sodium Hydroxide Hyaluronic Acid Ruby Powder Ethylhexylglycerin Aluminium Hydroxide Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil Glucosyl Hesperidin Tocopherol Acetate Retinol Lecithin Limonene Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: AM & PM. Use ring finger to apply 1 pump for both eyes along the orbital bone, from the outside corner of the eye inward.
ingredients: Aqua (Water) Glycerin Cyclopentasiloxane Propanediol Dimethiconol Coco-Caprylate/Caprate Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer Phenoxyethanol Mica Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil Sodium Benzoate Isohexadecane Polysorbate 60 Triethoxycaprylylsilane Maslinic Acid Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Sodium Hydroxide Hyaluronic Acid Ruby Powder Ethylhexylglycerin Aluminium Hydroxide Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil Glucosyl Hesperidin Tocopherol Acetate Retinol Lecithin Limonene Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)

reviews.headline: Works if you do your research
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I found this after following a dermatologist and she talked about what eye creams to use for the issues you have. Not all eye creams are for all issues. I needed something for moisture and fine lines. This 100% worked for me! There was a huge difference after a short time and I will definitely buy another tube. If you're using this for dark circles, this won't help because you need a cream with different ingredients that are made for that problem.

reviews.headline: Did not notice any difference
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for two months and have noticed no difference. In fact, I feel the lines around my eyes and bags under my eyes are more prominent than when I used a No. 7 eye cream. I wouldn't waste the expense again. Going back to No. 7.

reviews.headline: Eye wrinkles all gone.
reviews.comments:
I am almost 50 & had some wrinkle around my eye.  After about 1 month of use every night, it was noticeably less.  After a few more months, my crows feet around the corner of my eyes are gone.  After application I put any extra around my lips for maintenance. My lips don't have wrinkles nor fine lines.

I am finishing up my 2nd tube & will be purchasing a 3rd.  It has been already over 1 year of nightly use, so a little goes a long way.

I never had dark circles & really don't have issues with puffiness.  But for sure I have not have any issues in developing dark circles nor puffiness.  Best eye cream ever & I have tried other prior to coming across Dr. Brandt 24/7 Retinol Eye Cream.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: This eye cream is working really well for me. My dark circles are lightening and my puffy eyes are not as puffy. Have been using every morning.

reviews.headline: Does lighten dark circles
reviews.comments:
It does lighten my dark bluish purple circles and seems to tighten then skin so I'm not so puffy. 
Just started using it nightly instead of Tulas. I use that one in the morning. 
A lot goes a long way.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Use mornings and night and with constant use really helps the fine lines.

reviews.headline: didn't do anything
reviews.comments: this didn't do anything for my eyes. I have smile lines, wrinkles and dark circles and it didn't do anything for any if it.

reviews.headline: I love this stuff !  Really works !
reviews.comments: There are no "cons" with this product.  I have had really small white dots or bumps under my eye and a sales associate suggested this product.  They are almost all gone and the ones that remain (which my dermatologist will zap off) are barely visible.  I personally believe it will also lighten dark spots under the eyes. I hope they never quit making this product.
